info.author: strg.at
info.description:
.. image:: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/score-framework/py.doc/master/docs/score-banner.png
    :target: http://score-framework.org

`The SCORE Framework`_ is a collection of harmonized python and javascript
libraries for the development of large scale web projects. Powered by strg.at_.

.. _The SCORE Framework: http://score-framework.org
.. _strg.at: http://strg.at


score.pyfilesystem
==================

This python package provides an easy integration of PyFilesystem2_ in your next
score project.

The `narrative documentation of score.pyfilesystem`__ contains all the
information you need to put this module to good use.

.. _PyFilesystem2: https://pyfilesystem2.readthedocs.io
__ http://www.score-framework.org/doc/python/pyfilesystem/
